author: TV Guide
title: Hooray! 2 Broke Girls Will Return Early, But Which Show Is It Replacing This Fall?
text: Hooray! 2 Broke Girls Will Return Early, But Which Show Is It Replacing This Fall? Max and Caroline's journey to cupcake success will resume earlier than expected.CBS has announced that Season 5 of 2 Broke Girls will premiere onThursday, Nov. 12 at 9:30/8... Comment Posted Oct. 14, 2015 at 8:10 PM Updated at 10:46 PM Posted Oct. 14, 2015 at 8:10 PM Updated at 10:46 PM Â» Social News Max and Caroline's journey to cupcake success will resume earlier than expected. CBS has announced that Season 5 of 2 Broke Girls will premiere onThursday, Nov. 12 at 9:30/8:30c, which is months earlier than the expected midseason return. The timeslot was originally planned for Jane Lynch's new comedy Angel From Hell . Instead, Angel From Hell will now premiere in February 2016, after Mom , which debuts its third season on Thursday, Nov. 5 at 9/8c. (Full disclosure: TVGuide.com is owned by CBS) Video: Angel From Hell first look Other Links From TVGuide.com
